tool_description: PUBG API for all PUBG items such as weapons, ammo, maps, consumables, etc.
title: PUBG APIS

api_list.name: All Gun Category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com/cat"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.name: Scar-L
body.short_description: The FN SCAR is a gas-operated self-loading rifle with a rotating bolt.

body.name: M416
body.short_description: The HK416, (referred to as the M416 in-game) is an assault rifle/carbine type weapon in BATTLEGROUNDS.

body.name: Groza
body.short_description: The OTs-14 Groza is a Russian selective fire bullpup assault rifle chambered for the 7.62x39 round and the 9x39mm subsonic round.

body.name: QBZ
body.short_description: The QBZ-95 was first observed outside China on 1 July 1997, when the United Kingdom transferred the sovereignty of Hong Kong to the People's Republic of China

body.name: M762
body.short_description: The Beryl M762 is a versatile assault rifle with more attachment points than the AKM, on par with the SCAR-L

body.name: Kar98K
body.short_description: The Karabiner 98 kurz is a bolt-action rifle chambered for the 7.92Ã—57mm Mauser cartridge that was adopted on 21 June 1935

body.name: UMP45
body.short_description: The UMP has been adopted by various agencies such as the U.S. Customs and Border Protection.

body.name: M249
body.short_description: The M249 light machine gun, formerly designated the M249 Squad Automatic Weapon

body.name: P92
body.short_description: The Beretta 92 is a series of semi-automatic pistols designed and manufactured by Beretta of Italy.

body.name: P1911
body.short_description: The M1911, also known as the "Government" or "Colt Government", is a single-action pistol

body.name: R1895
body.short_description: A Nagant M1895 produced in 1941 by the Tula Arsenal with its 7.62Ã—38mmR ammunition

body.name: Flare Gun
body.short_description: Flare gun is used to create illumination for improved vision or as a distress signal.

body.name: Crossbow
body.short_description: A crossbow is a type of elastic ranged weapon in similar principle to a bow, consisting of a bow-like assembly called a prod.

    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.title: Erangel
body.description: PUBG's original map, Erangel is an 8x8 island whose terrain ranges from open grasslands to tall mountains, with cities and towns mixed in-between. Two bridges connect the larger portion of the island to Erangel's Military Base, making for a dangerous route to and from the small island.

api_list.name: All Map
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com/maps"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.title: Erangel
body.description: PUBG's original map, Erangel is an 8x8 island whose terrain ranges from open grasslands to tall mountains, with cities and towns mixed in-between. Two bridges connect the larger portion of the island to Erangel's Military Base, making for a dangerous route to and from the small island.

body.title: Miramar
body.description: Miramar is the traditional 8x8 map size with more of a desert theme. By sheer land mass, it is the biggest map in PUBG with the vast majority of the space being filled by land and a couple of small cities. It's rough terrain means off-road driving is more difficult and the lack of trees make for a sniper's haven.

body.title: Sanhok
body.description: PUBG's smallest map, Sanhok, is a dense island full of trees and hills. Rivers split the island into 3 major sections, so players will have to assess the risks of crossing through water or over one of the island's many bridges. Sanhok's size and available loot lead to a much more hectic and fast-paced battle than traditional PUBG maps.

body.title: Vikendi
body.description: The snow-covered fields of Vikendi bring a unique new feel to PUBG in this 6x6 map. With frozen bodies of water, special vehicles to traverse the snowy landscapes, and footprints to track your enemies, Vikendi is an entirely different way to experience thrilling PUBG gameplay. (Note: This map is no longer support. removed after version 1.3)

body.title: Karakin
body.description: Karakin is a 2x2 km island off the coast of North Africa. Karakin is the first map where BATTLEGROUNDS implemented a Black Zone, where the layout changes every match.

body.title: Livik
body.description: Livik is said to be the newest addition to PUBG Mobile. The map is relatively tiny and only allows for a maximum of 50 players.

api_list.name: All Equipment

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubg-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
